remarks: An alternative definition of proper substitution ~ df-sb .  Similar to ~ dfsb7 in that it involves a dummy variable ` z ` , but expressed in terms of ` A. ` rather than ` E. ` .  For a version which only requires ` F/ z ph ` rather than ` z ` and ` ph ` being distinct, see ~ sb7af . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 5-Feb-2018.)
statement:
dfsb7a $p |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> A. z ( z = y -> A. x ( x = z -> ph ) ) ) $.
$d ph z $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
